SEARCH
Package users.students

Class Student

java.lang.Object
users.BaseUser
users.students.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CanBecomeResearcher, User
Direct Known Subclasses:
BachelorStudent, GraduateStudent
public abstract class Student extends BaseUser implements CanBecomeResearcher
Represents a student with various academic and extracurricular functionalities. Students can register for courses, view their schedule, join organizations, and participate in research activities. This class also supports students becoming researchers and managing their diploma projects.
See Also:

    • Student

      public Student(String firstName, String lastName, int age, Gender gender, Degree degree, School school, int year)
      Parameterized constructor to initialize a student with personal and academic details.
      Parameters:
      firstName - First name of the student
      lastName - Last name of the student
      age - Age of the student
      gender - Gender of the student
      degree - Degree program the student is enrolled in
      school - School the student belongs to
      year - Year of study
